original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2696)@在武將四周，召喚出10名白毦兵，攻擊附近的敵人。白毦兵屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1226)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1226)@
text: Response time:  $Skill_CD(2696)@ Around the military general, summoned 10 white squad soldiers to attack nearby enemies. The physical strength of the white bat soldier:  $Soldier_HP(1226)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1226)@
